intro: Oeonia erostris var. robusta, commonly known as the robust spiderwort, is a flowering plant native to parts of North America. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae and is characterized by its showy, blue to violet flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant typically grows in moist, well-drained soils in woodland or wetland habitats. It has slender, upright stems with opposite, lance-shaped leaves. The species is notable for its ornamental value and its role in supporting local pollinator populations.
